text: Daniel Anthony Noriega, better known by the stage name Adore Delano, (born September 29, 1989) is an American drag queen, singer-songwriter, and television personality. Noriega was a contestant on the seventh season of American Idol in 2008 and later competed in the sixth season of RuPaul's Drag Race. ==References== Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:American LGBT rights activists Category:LGBT singers Category:American LGBT writers Category:American singer-songwriters Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:LGBT people from California Category:Actors from California Category:Singers from California Category:Writers from California
title: Adore Delano
